meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> <radical>rake</radical>d all the <radical>mountain</radical>s down into flat land so he could see everyone in the kingdom from his castle windows. You should share your <kanji>congratulations</kanji> with him. Now, quick tell him this was a great idea.
readingMnemonic: The moment you say "<kanji>Congratulations</kanji>!" you've already started to <reading>miss</reading> (みず) those beautiful mountains. But you can't let missing them ruin your congratulations! Don't let the king know!
